about.title: About This Project
about.description: This Savings Calculator is a Social Action Project created by Ayan Roshan Umredkar. It aims to help people make informed financial decisions by providing easy-to-use calculators for different savings scenarios.
about.features: The calculator offers three main features:
featuresList: Basic Savings Calculator - For simple compound interest calculations
Goal-based Calculator - To determine how much you need to save monthly to reach a specific financial goal
Plan Comparison - To compare two different savings or investment plans
about.conclusion: We believe financial literacy is essential for everyone, and we hope this tool helps you plan your financial future better.
